etl.description: Transfer raw data imported in tmp_taxon_scientific_name to taxon_scientific_name
etl.query:
SELECT src_taxon_name_id, taxonomic_status, scientific_name, canonical_name, scientific_name_authorship, generic_name, specific_epithet, infraspecific_epithet, name_published_in FROM sapin.tmp_taxon_scientific_name ORDER BY taxonomic_status, src_taxon_name_id
INSERT INTO sapin.taxon_scientific_name ( src_taxon_name_id, taxonomic_status, scientific_name, canonical_name, scientific_name_authorship, generic_name, specific_epithet, infraspecific_epithet, name_published_in ) VALUES ( ?src_taxon_name_id, ?taxonomic_status::sapin.taxonomic_status_enum, ?scientific_name, ?canonical_name, ?scientific_name_authorship, ?generic_name, ?specific_epithet, ?infraspecific_epithet, ?name_published_in ) ON CONFLICT DO NOTHING
